title: Quick question for a Rioter or someone who works on the Story branch!
body:
Hi Story team! 

Since my English isn't the best due to non native speaker, I just would love to know if you have any plans for Talon's lore update! 

It's been a while since Noxus's release and I remember a Rioter said that Talon and Riven stories were on the way, that we shouldn't worry about waiting another long year to hear news from both.

And since Riven's lore has been updated along with Ionia, I was just wondering if we will have anything, even a hint for Talon's lore before the end of the year.

I appreciate y'all for reading my post! 
                              {{champion:91}} 
{{item:1036}} LONGSWORDS FOR LIFE{{item:1036}} 

PS: I'm a spanish roleplayer, that's why I was wondering if he will ever be changed!

replies.body:
Yes, we have plans. :-)

I can't really say anything more than that!
What about my boy, Vladimir?

Maybe if we get only a little bit more annoying something will happen? I have a gut feeling.
You might be onto something, there. I hear that usually works! ;-)
